subject: Re: [junit] Running setUp once for all tests in a test suite
msgSnippet: ... Make the test data class variables and do the initialization in a static block? It s slightly less OO than some other solutions, but it s done what I need
messageBody:
Grant Lewis <lewis@...> writes:

> Can somebody help explain how to setup a TestCase so the setUp
> method is executed once for all the tests. I posed this question a
> week or so ago a and never received a reply with sufficient detail
> explaining how to do it. Somebody suggested I look at the TestSetup
> class in the extensions package, but I didn't get very far with that
> approach.

Make the test data class variables and do the initialization in a
static block? It's slightly less OO than some other solutions, but
it's done what I need it to.

JLM
